Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Captured 422 glycopeptides from 155 glycoproteins in human serum (2 μL).

Other Information.Additional Info: Ce-MOF@PA demonstrated superior stability and recyclability compared to unmodified Ce-MOF, with excellent hydrophilicity due to phosphate and hydroxyl groups from phytic acid.
